message:
Animelo Summer Live 2005 - ONENESS -THE BRIDGE-
Animelo Summer Live 2006 - OUTRIDE -OUTRIDE-
Animelo Summer Live 2007 - Generation-A -Generation-A-
Animelo Summer Live 2008 - Yells ~It’s A Beautiful Life~ -Challenge-
Animelo Summer Live 2009 - RE:BRIDGE〜Return to oneself〜 -RE:BRIDGE-
Animelo Summer Live 2010 - Evolution 〜for beloved one〜-evolution-
Animelo Summer Live 2011 – Rainbow -rainbow-
Animelo Summer Live 2012 - Infinity -1000-nen no Yume- -infinity-
Animelo Summer Live 2013 - The Galaxy Express 999 -Flag Nine-
Animelo Summer Live 2014 - ONENESS 2014 ver. -Oneness-
Animelo Summer Live 2015 - Hajimare, THE GATE!! -The Gate-
Animelo Summer Live 2016 - PASSION RIDERS -TOKI-
Animelo Summer Live 2017 - Playing the World -THE CARD-

今天看ASL2017时突然想收一下主题曲
强迫症一收就收合集 但往年的已经很难找了所以前来万能班请求支资援源
不需要无损 mp3就行了
title: [万能班求支援]求ASL各年主题曲的合集
userSign: (こんなこと、気付かなければよかったのに ...)
